name: Himawari no Matsuri
desc: As the seasonal flower blooms beautifully, born a girl that has an indescribable beauty...

name: Edited Cosplayer Gallery
desc: One of the most big Japanese Events in Bali held by Key Creative Space

name: Bunkasai 9th Unmas
desc: This event is one of the annual events held by Mahasaraswati University Denpasar (UNMAS). The 9th UNMAS Bunkasai for this year has the theme "キラキラの祭り" which translates to "Sparkling Festival." This Glittering Festival will be held on June 3, 2023, for academic competitions, and on the main day, June 4, 2023, for general competitions! ✨

name: Perfect Month for Coswalk Competition
desc: "Perfect Month for Coswalk Competition" is one of the cosplay events organized by Bagie Entertainment, taking place at Lippo Mall Kuta.

name: TSM Coswalk Competition
desc: Edelweiss, Edelweiss every morning you greet me small and white clean and bright

name: Nikeba no Matsuri
desc: An annual event held by Politeknik Negeri Bali. This year's Nikeba Matsuri #4 of Bali State Polytechnic with the theme "Haru no Kaze" which means "Spring Breeze." Just as the spirit, hard work, and creativity of the students will continue to bloom and inspire the lives of the community and the nation.
